bibl.title: A Single Scribe in P. Oxy. IV 660 + P. Oxy. XXIII [sic, lire: XXXII] 2623 + PSI inv. 1907 (Chroral Lyric: Simonides?).
bibl.note: P. Oxy. IV, 660 (= Pack2 1938) + P. Oxy. XXXII, 2623 + P.S.I. Inv. 1907 = P.S.I. Comunicazioni 2005 2. - 1. A new scribe from Oxyrhynchus. - 2. Palaeographic description and dating. - 3. A brief overview about content and authorship: previous evidence and new perspectives.
UCCIARDELLO Giuseppe, A Single Scribe in P. Oxy. IV 660 + P. Oxy. XXIII [sic, lire: XXXII] 2623 + PSI inv. 1907 (Chroral Lyric: Simonides?).
